data.question: What is the capital of Kazakhstan ?
Assembly line operation is also called as ?
Of the following, identify the memory usually written by the manufacturer ?
Choose the right formula of AMAT ?
choices: Average Memory Access time = Hit Time + Miss Rate * Miss penalty
Average Memory Access time = Hit Rate + Miss Rate * Miss penalty
Average Memory Access time = Hit Time + Miss time * Miss penalty
Average Memory Access time = Hit Rate + Miss time * Miss penalty
data.answer: Average Memory Access time = Hit Rate + Miss Rate * Miss penalty
